name: Odesk Clone | Odesk Clone Script
short_description: Odesk marketplace software is an effective tool in the hands entrepreneurs big and small to outsource their projects to freelancers and contractors. The software when used aims to bring both employers and freelancers under one roof. The employers on finding suitable freelancers engage in the outsourcing business at affordable budgets. Suitable freelancers then get opportunity to deliver work under constraints of time and money. Thus, both the employers and freelancers are benefited. Based on this Odesk marketplace software, a new product has been created at Scriptgiant Technologies Pvt. Ltd. that is known as the Odesk clone software. The clone software has numerous features and functionalities that are unique in every respect. This is so as this software is updated on a regular basis to add new features and properties.
